content: Is it possible to retrieve the standard "OperationDefinitions" from the zip file using the .NET API? I can't seem to work out how. I can see methods for resource types used in validation (structureDefinition, codeSystem, valueSet etc) but not OpertionDefintions ...
You could check out ZipSource.ListResourceUris(filter = ResourceType.OperationDefinition) and go from there.
